about_the_game:
Spring is coming to your bakery! Celebrate all the new-ness of spring with a fun mix of Easter items too! Hang up pastel banners, and pretty floral cutouts around your bakery. Bake bunny cakes, and bumble bee cookies all the while keeping on the lookout for decorated eggs hidden around your bakery!


Get your bakery fresh and ready for Spring with a fun mix of decorations! String up pretty bunting, hang butterfly banners, egg-cellent chalkboard designs, paper cutouts of flowers, bows, and more.


We’ve added over 40 new Spring and Easter-themed recipes. Picture lots of flowers, bunnies, bumble bees, Easter eggs, and spring chicks all in the form of cakes, cookies, donuts, and more!


As you bake and sell festive recipes you'll earn 'Spring Tickets' that you can collect and spend in the Spring Shop.


Find decorated eggs hiding in random places inside and outside of your bakery. Collect them to earn extra Spring Tickets!


Spend your tickets in the spring shop to buy lovely decorations, potted flowers, wallpapers, and more!



Put out your favorite refillable candy basket for your customers to spread the springtime feeling!


We've added 9 seasonal wallpapers including different flower wallpapers, Easter egg wallpapers, and fresh spring grid wallpapers.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
